entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
